rules_text:
Flying
Devour artifact and/or creature 2 [i](As this enters, you may sacrifice any number of artifacts and/or creatures. This creature enters with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)[/i]
notes:
New card — Replaced Food Fight

Red’s slots seemed a little lopsided (for lack of a better word), so a lot of them had to be reworked or shifted around. With the WOE print of Food Fight and the reworked focus of the set at large, it made snese to shift Food Fight up to rare, like in WOE, and open the slot up for a big devour creature.
